segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are being so sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to say something, but I’m not sure she’d even hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy looks like he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still so focused on that plate, like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to look up and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me so tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I need to take a deep breath and just watch how it all unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR
